'''''Please Play Safely''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to play with all 12 of the named [[Aranara]] who offer to play minigames scattered around Sumeru, and open their respective Common Chests.<!--To verify, as some chests need to be opened while some can be left unopened-->

==Gameplay Notes==
* The {{Quest|Aranyaka}} must be started to talk to the Aranara, otherwise they will flee on sight of the player.
* There are 4 different named Aranara to interact with, each one appearing in 3 different locations. The Aranara that need to be interacted with are as follows:
** [[Arachanda]]
** [[Aradanish]]
** [[Aragita]]
** [[Arapratap]]
* The 12 Aranara are only found in the [[Dharma Forest]] area of Sumeru.
* The 64 unnamed Aranara scattered around Sumeru are not required for this achievement. They instead award the achievement ''[[For Meritorious Service]]''.
